医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新药有望治疗杜氏肌营养不良症一种新药有望治疗杜氏肌营养不良症（DMD），这是一种罕见的遗传性疾病，会导致严重的肌肉退化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Novel-drug-holds-promise-for-treating-Duchenne-muscular-dystropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Novel-drug-holds-promise-for-treating-Duchenne-muscular-dystropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39401873-537a-4bce-bc23-44705be17c87 Mon, 16 Dec 2024 13:25:08 -0500 Novel drug holds promise for treating Duchenne muscular dystrophy
凯斯勒基金会科学家获得老年人跌倒预防研究资助基兰·卡鲁纳卡兰 (Kiran Karunakaran) 博士是凯斯勒基金会移动与康复工程中心的研究科学家兼平衡评估和培训实验室主任，他获得了国家残疾、独立生活和康复研究所提供的为期三年、价值 599,998 美元的资助研究（NIDILRR）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Kessler-Foundation-scientist-receives-grant-for-fall-prevention-research-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Kessler-Foundation-scientist-receives-grant-for-fall-prevention-research-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=202ecc9c-772f-43ea-b22c-1dcfcf025ef9 Mon, 16 Dec 2024 13:13:28 -0500 Kessler Foundation scientist receives grant for fall prevention research in older adults
微生物胆汁酸以相反的方式影响结肠癌风险生活在我们肠道中的微生物通过重塑肝脏产生的用于分解脂肪的胆汁酸来帮助我们消化食物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Microbial-bile-acids-affect-colon-cancer-risk-in-opposite-ways.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Microbial-bile-acids-affect-colon-cancer-risk-in-opposite-ways.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abb63065-ccb2-46e1-9296-8b8dd6874414 Mon, 16 Dec 2024 13:04:22 -0500 Microbial bile acids affect colon cancer risk in opposite ways
研究人员对导致雷特综合征的分子变化有了新的认识贝勒医学院、德克萨斯儿童医院 Jan 和 Dan Duncan 神经学研究所 (Duncan NRI) 及合作机构的研究人员对导致 Rett 综合征的分子变化有了新的认识，Rett 综合征是一种由 MeCP2 基因编码突变引起的严重神经系统疾病甲基-CpG 结合蛋白 2 (MeCP2)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Researchers-gain-new-insights-into-the-molecular-changes-leading-to-Rett-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Researchers-gain-new-insights-into-the-molecular-changes-leading-to-Rett-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89a2e5c7-a79f-4e9d-ad17-96d11b92e56f Mon, 16 Dec 2024 12:57:42 -0500 Researchers gain new insights into the molecular changes leading to Rett syndrome
合作项目旨在缩小哮喘护理中的诊断差距哮喘影响着全世界超过 2.6 亿人，仅美国就有近 2800 万人受到哮喘影响，平均每天有 10 人死于这种慢性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Collaborative-project-seeks-to-close-diagnostic-gap-in-asthma-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Collaborative-project-seeks-to-close-diagnostic-gap-in-asthma-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=554253ca-66b1-4baf-a06d-084bfd67de59 Mon, 16 Dec 2024 12:42:00 -0500 Collaborative project seeks to close diagnostic gap in asthma care
研究揭示多巴胺在压力诱发的心血管反应中的作用在压力下，动物会改变自己的行为，例如通过“战斗或逃跑”或“冻结”反应。同时，体内会触发适应压力所必需的生理反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Study-reveals-dopamines-role-in-stress-induced-cardioangio-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Study-reveals-dopamines-role-in-stress-induced-cardioangio-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2dd7b70e-2325-4a44-b96f-840c5e20affb Mon, 16 Dec 2024 12:28:36 -0500 Study reveals dopamine's role in stress-induced cardiovascular responses
双核铂（II）络合物可以为治疗前列腺癌提供更有针对性的方法前列腺癌仍然是全球健康挑战，是男性中第二常见的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Dinuclear-platinum(II)-complexes-could-offer-a-more-targeted-approach-to-treating-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Dinuclear-platinum(II)-complexes-could-offer-a-more-targeted-approach-to-treating-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80483da4-e644-410e-becd-85b9c240933a Mon, 16 Dec 2024 12:22:12 -0500 Dinuclear platinum(II) complexes could offer a more targeted approach to treating prostate cancer
新方法通过大脑情绪反应检测帕金森病堪培拉大学和科威特科学技术学院的联合研究小组通过分析大脑对观看视频剪辑或图像等情绪情况的反应，以近乎完美的精度实现了对帕金森病的突破性检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/New-method-detects-Parkinsons-disease-through-emotional-brain-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/New-method-detects-Parkinsons-disease-through-emotional-brain-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c08f1878-acf2-46db-83c3-945bebb9e31b Mon, 16 Dec 2024 11:19:59 -0500 New method detects Parkinson's disease through emotional brain responses
科学家创建血液测试以提高癌症治疗效果皇家墨尔本理工大学和多尔蒂研究所的科学家开发了一种新的血液测试，可以筛查癌症患者，帮助他们的治疗更安全、更有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Scientists-create-blood-test-to-enhance-cancer-treatment-effectness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Scientists-create-blood-test-to-enhance-cancer-treatment- effectiveness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b55f8ecf-7474-4d9c-a42c-675d71bb3472 Mon, 16 Dec 2024 11:12:22 -0500 Scientists create blood test to enhance cancer treatment effectiveness
纽约大学朗格尼 IBD 中心庆祝改变生活两周年炎症性肠病 (IBD) 是一种复杂、慢性且使人衰弱的疾病，影响着大约 300 万美国人，其中包括克罗恩病和溃疡性结肠炎患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/NYU-Langone-IBD-Center-celebrates-two-years-of-transforming-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/NYU-Langone-IBD-Center-celebrates-two-years-of-transforming-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=068ca7d9-9a29-48db-845b-14e615808ad5 Mon, 16 Dec 2024 10:55:59 -0500 NYU Langone IBD Center celebrates two years of transforming lives
